entities.name: pamphlet-makers
entities.description: The pamphlet-makers are still clustered around the remains of the Decoy Detonator, indicating their presence in the area.

entities.name: decoy detonator
entities.description: The Decoy Detonator is a device that continues to hoot feebly as it smoked, suggesting its malfunctioning state.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry hurried off up the corridor, indicating his involvement in the situation and his concern for the Decoy Detonator.

entities.name: experimental charms
entities.description: The young witch mentions Experimental Charms as a possible source of the Decoy Detonator, indicating its connection to this department.

entities.name: poisonous duck
entities.description: The poisonous duck is mentioned by the young witch as an example of the carelessness of Experimental Charms, suggesting that it may have been involved in a previous incident.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: Harry reviews his options and considers the possibility that the locket was never at the Ministry, indicating its location as a relevant factor in the situation.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the Decoy Detonator, as evidenced by his hurried departure and review of options.
The young witch suggests that Experimental Charms may be responsible for the Decoy Detonator, indicating a possible connection between the two.
Harry reviews his options and considers the possibility that the locket was never at the Ministry, indicating its location as a relevant factor in the situation.
